attributes.action: Let the Scottish People have the right to determine their own future
attributes.additional_details: We don’t want independence from England. We want independence from Westminster. This is not a war. It’s simply self determination and making our own mistakes, successes, and choices by people in Scotland for people who live in Scotland.
attributes.background: It is galling to be told that we  have to ask if we might be allowed to have a second vote on Scottish Independence and being informed that we have already said No to Independence. That vote took place in September 2014 and a great deal has changed in the intervening four and a half years.
